Title: Windows 8 App Design Reference Template: Brick Style
Description: Brick Style  template will help if you want to adopt a brick style variable size display in your app's hub page. You can leverage this template for any scenario
HomeWiki:
Disclaimer: The template provided in the form of Visual Studio project (C# and JS) is meant to act as a starter kit for Windows 8 Store apps development. You are recommended to change or modify the look and feel to suit the branding that is required for your app. The template by no means restricts you to stick to the layout, navigation or other aspects indicated.

Project Description

Brick Style  template will help if you want to adopt a brick style variable size display in your app's hub page. You can leverage this template for any scenario. Please refer to the "snapshots" folder under the root template folder to get a glimpse of the templates look and feel. 

Download includes the following

  • Source (C# and JS)
  • Package
  • Snapshots
  • Documentation
